question: Can you please tell me for each of these names the following?Name for Boy/Girl/Both? Meaning in Arabic? Acceptable Islamic name or not? Hammoud,Safa,Ghufran,Amran,Ehsan,Hazar,Nur,Butul
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Hammoud- Boy - Greatly Praised - Acceptable
Safa - Boy - Pure - Acceptable
Ghufran - Boy - Forgiving - Acceptable
Amran - Boy- Flexible - Better not to use it
Ehsan - Boy-Beneficient,Charitable- Acceptable
Hazar - Boy- Cautious - Acceptable
Hadhar - Boy - Settled/ Present - Better not to use it
Hazhar - Boy-Banned/Prohibited - Not Acceptable
Nur - Boy -Light - Acceptable
Butul - Girl - Virgin,Chaste - Acceptable

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
